title: Why was the script of Dogri changed from Dogra Akkhar (Takri script) to Devanagari in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: In India, several scripts has historically been used to write a single language but most prevalent of them got accepted while minor one got discarded over the time. Devanagari was preferred for many languages across North India, it seems the case with Dogri also.
